text: The Daro District is a district and small town in Mukah Division, Sarawak, Malaysia. The nearest town to Daro is Matu. Daro is under the Majlis Daerah Matu-Daro (Matu-Daro District Council) which share the same council together with Matu. The population in Daro is estimated around 25,000, with Melanau making up the majority. There were ferries from Sibu to here, taking around two hours by using the channel of Rejang River. ==Education== ===Secondary school=== *SMK Toh Puan Datuk Patinggi Hajjah Normah, Daro *SMK Matu *SMK Belawai *SMK SEMOP ===Primary school=== 1\.
